description: Last line of each page maintains minimum word spacing (not squeezed together)
steps: Step 3: Check the last line on each page
Step 4: Verify words have minimum spacing between them (not compressed)
Step 5: Verify the line doesn't have words touching or nearly touching
Step 6: Compare with other lines - spacing should be consistent or left-aligned

description: Justified text respects minimum and maximum word spacing constraints
steps: Step 1: Load text that fills multiple pages
Step 2: Verify full lines have even word spacing
Step 3: Verify no line has words compressed below minimum spacing
Step 4: Verify no line has excessive gaps between words
Step 5: Last lines of paragraphs should be left-aligned (not force-justified)
Step 6: Export to PDF and verify spacing is maintained

description: User can adjust minimum and maximum word spacing in Print Settings
steps: Step 2: Locate word spacing controls (min space, max space)
Step 3: Adjust minimum word spacing value
Step 4: Verify preview updates with new spacing
Step 5: Adjust maximum word spacing value
Step 6: Verify preview reflects the constraint
Step 7: Export to PDF and verify spacing settings are applied
